title: Forever
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Yeah)
I wanna love you tonight, I wanna know you for life
I wanna give you forever
Thoughts of you all in my head, I’d rather stay in this bed
I wanna lay here forever
[Pre-Chorus]
At first, didn’t think we’d make it
Then suddenly it all started changin’
From just two kids in the basement
One night, two night, three night, four night like
[Chorus]
Damn
This feels like it’s forever
Hold my hand for forever
Kiss me now and forever (Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh)
Damn
This feels like it’s forever
Hold my hand for forever
Kiss me now and forever (Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh)
[Verse 2]
I wanna show you the world, I wanna spin you and twirl
I wanna give you tomorrow (Yeah)
I’m tеllin’ all of my friends that I’m in love with this girl
And I’m gonna love hеr forever

[Pre-Chorus]
At first, didn’t think we’d make it
Then suddenly it all started changin’
From just two kids in the basement
One night, two night, three night, four night like
[Chorus]
Damn
This feels like it’s forever
Hold my hand for forever
Kiss me now and forever (Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh)
Damn
This feels like it’s forever
Hold my hand for forever
Kiss me now and forever (Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh)
[Post-Chorus]
This feels like it’s forever
Hold my hand for forever
Kiss me now and forever (Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh)
